Topic.Title: i out ko going to 15 a share selllll

Message.Msg: Who should listen to you. You can't even put a correct sentence together.
One fund manager on Fox recently, in China the poor aspire to afford to drink a coke like westerners.In another words having disposable income.

Never short a stock when volume is below average, or you'll get burned. It will go back. RSI indicator is at 25, which means it is oversold. If you bought at a RSI of 25, and sold at a RSI of 80, you would win 86.54% of the time. The 13.46% of the loses were due to global recession. With the FED in the way, this won't happen until at least after the election. Couple that with the stock split, and this baby is going places. But we already knew that. KO is a good investment.

Topic.Title: buy buy buy ko $50 next week.

Message.Msg: RSI was at 25? But yeah. Strong buy alert.

Duck -- spot silver is now comfortably back over $30, and is still undervalued, IMO. A prudent time to add to the .9999 pure gold Maple Leaf position, also. And for all, representing a simple inflation hedge, do not forget the pre-1982 Lincoln Cents, whose .950 Cu content is now worth ~ 2.5 cents.
